# DisposableUtility.DisposeObject&lt;T&gt; method

Disposes and nulls the specified object.

```csharp
public static void DisposeObject<T>(ref T? obj)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| obj | The object to dispose and null. |

## Remarks

This method is similar to [`Dispose`](Dispose.md), but doesn't require that the parameter implement IDisposable; it will be checked at runtime.
